oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jack Roberts Job No. 37879
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Husky, Ferlin; Whitman, Slim;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 2431) for an order placed by Jack Roberts for 900 two color window cards for a performance by Ernest Tubb, Ferlin Huskey, Slim Whitman and others with 150 for the Salem Armory in Salem, Oregon on March 18, 100 for the Seattle Opera House on March 19, 200 for the Queen Elizabeth Theatre in Vancouver on March 20, 50 for the Capitol Theatre in Yakima on March 23, 100 for the High School Auditorium in Boise on March 24, 100 for the Oriental Theatre in Portland on March 25, and 200 for the Spokane Coliseum on March 26. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
